detaileddescription.para: This configuration option refers to whether the MET is local to this instantiation of TIME. If the MET is not local then TIME must be configured as using a virtual MET.
Therefore, all TIME clients must be configured as using a virtual MET. If the MET was local to any TIME client, then that instantiation of TIME would have to be the server.
TIME servers must be configured as using a virtual MET
Next: Specifying Time Source Prev: Specifying Time Server/Client Up To: Time Configuration
